CustomField.formula: "https://wa.me/" & IF ( Contains( Phone , " " ), SUBSTITUTE( Phone , " ", "" ) , IF ( Contains( Phone , "+" ), SUBSTITUTE( Phone , "+", "" ), IF ( Contains( Phone , "-" ), SUBSTITUTE( Phone , "-", "" ), IF ( Contains( Phone , "(" ), SUBSTITUTE( Phone , "(", "" ), IF ( Contains( Phone , ")" ), SUBSTITUTE( Phone , ")", "" ), Phone )))))
CustomField.label: Whatsapp Web Link Phone
